DIRECT ENTRY  
(i) MINNA accepts ND/NCE with a minimum of lower 
credit plus the UTME requirements.  
(ii) MINNA accepts ND/NCE credit into 200 level while 
those with HND may be admitted into 300 level.  
(iii) MAIDUGURI accepts ND/NCE/HND and any other 
similar qualification.  
(iv) UMUDIKE and DELSU same as in Agriculture.  
(v) MAUTY requires Chemistry and Biology/Agricultural 
Science/Physics.  
(vi) NDU accepts  
a. Passes at the ‘A’ level GCE or HSC in three (3) of the 
following subjects: Biology, Zoology, Botany, 
Chemistry, Physics, Geography, Economics or  
Mathematics;   
b. ND in Agriculture or Fisheries;
